alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cameron; Coastal Willacy; Inland Cameron; Inland Willacy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 1:42PM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...Dangerous Wind Gusts to Continue in Cameron and Willacy Mainly East of IH-69E Until 3 PM... A strong low level jet combined with full sunshine and heating is helping to mix winds of 55 to 65 mph down to the surface at exposed locations in Cameron and Willacy County, from Brownsville to Raymondville toward Laguna Madre. Minor damage has been reported around Brownsville since just before noon, and local power outages have increased in these parts of Cameron County. Additional minor damage and power outages are likely until 3 PM. The Wind Advisory will likely be extended to cover continued wind gusts of 40 to 57 mph. Winds will diminish later this afternoon as a cold front approaches from the west.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Cameron; Coastal Willacy; Inland Cameron; Inland Willacy
